For #Cavs, there was an abundance of ugly on Friday night. But the expected starting lineup was as advertised. And they had their "spirit" back as Jarrett Allen made his season debut. Now they can start building & figuring out who they can become

#Cavs Donovan Mitchell on another loss and a disappointing 2-4 start: 

‚ÄúThis loss sucks. Wasn‚Äôt a great performance. But not dwelling on it. Not sitting here sulking about it. I think we are in a good headspace as a group. Nothing to overreact about"

#Cavs finally got a chance to use their expected Opening Night starting lineup on Friday. Early on, it looked like a group of guys who had never played together before. By the time, they figured it out, it was too late

That was an awesome bounce back quarter for the Cavs. Thought Evan Mobley did a lot of really good stuff there.
Well well well. We have a two-point game. #Cavs have surged here in the third quarter -- and Donovan Mitchell is spectacular.

SO MANY of #Cavs Evan Mobley's misses are front-rimmed short. It's like he pulled the string on himself. He has been working on getting the ball up higher on his release. But it's still not getting there.
Little frustration for #Cavs tonight. Darius Garland has a technical foul already. Now Max Strus does as well.
The electric blue court seems to be providing some issues already. Two guys have slipped and they keep having to bring the brooms out to wipe it off. More so than usual.

After five games, #Cavs will finally be able to unleash their expected Opening Night starting lineup. Darius Garland and Jarrett Allen are both back tonight, sources tell @clevelanddotcom. It's Allen's season debut.

#Cavs have opened a seven-point lead here late in the third quarter. Their biggest lead over the Knicks since Game 2 of the playoff series last April.
#Cavs Isaac Okoro with his fourth foul of the first half. No ideal on a night when he is supposed to have the Jalen Brunson matchup.
#Cavs Tristan Thompson is the first Cavalier not named Donovan Mitchell to score tonight. Who had that on their bingo card?
